metadata.name: ErcForge Member
metadata.description:
This NFT grants zero fees on our website www.ercforge.io. The supply is limited for our first supporters. Mint your Member token on the link below.

The supply of this token is currently zero. We will announce the exact date of the mint event on our Twitter page. The mint supply will be low and limited.

Mint page: https://app.ercforge.io/mint/0xd321c8115340ee93EB53e797f8dBCb5d5ec0C282/1
